Pre-Game Insights: The New York Mets look to keep their momentum going Sunday against the Philadelphia Phillies in Game 2 of the National League Division Series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets and Phillies will broadcast nationally on FS1 for Game 2 of their NL Division Series.
The winner advances to the National League Championship Series.
Others: Game 2 of the NLDS is scheduled for 4:08 p.m. Sunday on FS1.
